name: df-alsi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(walsi(s0, w0, w1), wa(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, w0)))
comment: Define "all some" applied to a top-level implication, which means ` ps ` is true whenever ` ph ` is true and there is at least one ` x ` where ` ph ` is true. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Oct-2018.)
